exceptions.tactic: apply option_rel_some_inv in H0 as [b [Hb HRab]].

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type R : rel A B sA : A -> Prop sB : B -> Prop a : A The term "prod_rel_transport_eq_pair R R" has type "forall (x : A * A) (y : B * B) (a1 a2 : A), Transport (R * R) x y (x = (a1, a2)) (exists b1 b2 : B, y = (b1, b2) /\\ R a1 b1 /\\ R a2 b2)" while it is expected to have type "A * A -> B * B -> ?C" (cannot instantiate "?C" because "x" is not in its scope: available arguments are "A" "B" "R" "sA" "sB" "a").
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
The reference b was not found in the current environment.

original: apply option_rel_some_inv in H0 as [b [Hb HRab]]. apply (uncurry (prod_rel_transport_eq_pair R R)). split. - exists b. split; auto. - split. + auto. + auto.
